t: BoomTouch Wireless Portable Speaker- No Dock, No Wires, No Bluetooth Required, Amplifies Your Device's Sound, As Seen On TV (Black) : Amazon.sg: Electronics
s: It works through induction, sound-to-vibration-to-sound, but loses little and seems as good as bluetooth for my purposes. A great thing to have around. I bought 2. Note: The BoomTouch uses 3 AA batteries. An alternative brand, Supvin, looks almost identical, but uses a USB connection to charge.
The volume can be adjusted on your device. You cannot manually change the volume on the BoomTouch speaker.
